entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 11 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
